動物用藥品名稱: 貝歐克雞新城病、傳染性支氣管炎、傳染性鼻炎不活化混合疫苗
業者名稱: 台灣龍馬躍股份有限公司
地址: S.S 234 PER CREMONA, KM 28, 2 27013 CHIGNOLO PO (PAVIA) ITALY
效能(適應症): 預防雞感染新城病、傳染性支氣管炎、傳染性鼻炎。
ingredients: NEWCASTLE DISEASE VIRUS, ULSTER 2C STRAIN,INACTIVATED, AT LEAST 10^9.0 EID50; INFECTIOUS BRONCHITIS VIRUS,M41 STRAIN, INACTIVATED, AT LEAST 10^6.7 EID50; HAEMOPHILUSPARAGALLINARUM, SEROTYPES A & C,   INACTIVATED, AT LEAST 3×10^9.0CFU; MINERAL OIL (LIQUID PARAFFIN-MARCOL 52) 0.360ML; MANNIDEMONOOIEATE 0.040ML; THIOMERSAL (SODIUM ETHYLMERCURITHIOSALICILATE) 50MCG.
